titles.title: 808 Burdens Are Lifted At Calvary (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Days are filled with sorrow and care
Hearts are lonely and drear
Burdens are lifted at Calvary
Jesus is very near

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Burdens are lifted at Calvary
Calvary Calvary
Burdens are lifted at Calvary
Jesus is very near

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Cast your care on Jesus today
Leave your worry and fear
Burdens are lifted at Calvary
Jesus is very near

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Troubled soul the Savior can see
Every heart-ache and tear
Burdens are lifted at Calvary
Jesus is very near
